mapper.select: /* etc.mng.external.system.url.getList */ SELECT A.ext_url ,A.sys_nm ,to_char(A.reg_dt,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') reg_dt ,to_char(A.updt_dt,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') updt_dt ,A.reg_user_id ,A.updt_user_id ,USR.name reg_user_name FROM kcgbd.t_ext_sys_url_mng A ,kcgbd.t_user USR WHERE 1=1 AND USR.user_id = A.reg_user_id

/* etc.mng.external.system.url.getInfo */ SELECT A.ext_url ,A.sys_nm ,to_char(A.reg_dt,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') reg_dt ,to_char(A.updt_dt,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') updt_dt ,A.reg_user_id ,A.updt_user_id ,USR.name reg_user_name FROM kcgbd.t_ext_sys_url_mng A ,kcgbd.t_user USR WHERE 1=1 AND USR.user_id = A.reg_user_id AND A.ext_url = #{ext_url}
/* etc.mng.external.system.url.chkDpl */ SELECT count(ext_url) cnt FROM kcgbd.t_ext_sys_url_mng A ,kcgbd.t_user USR WHERE 1=1 AND USR.user_id = A.reg_user_id AND A.ext_url = #{ext_url}
